plot: When Clark's ex-girlfriend steals a sentimental painting of his, he enlists the help of his oddball friend, Paul, who leads them on a harebrained journey to get it back.
title: The Armadillo
plot_es: When Clark's ex-girlfriend steals a sentimental painting of his, he enlists the help of his oddball friend, Paul, who leads them on a harebrained journey to get it back.
plot_en: When Clark's ex-girlfriend steals a sentimental painting of his, he enlists the help of his oddball friend, Paul, who leads them on a harebrained journey to get it back.
